name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Newtab - Elevate Your Focus Experience

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Focus Newtab extension to search directly from a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is introducing 'Focus Timer',  it designed to boost your productivity and help you stay focused on your tasks. With its built-in countdown timer feature, Focus Timer enables you to set a specific time duration and remain concentrated during that period.

Also it allows users to quickly and easily access to their most visited sites. Extension can be customised to suit user preferences.

"By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the 'Focus Newtab' extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
The Modern Search extension replaces your New Tab search engine and provides a new search experience with search results by Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://focus-newtab.com/pages/terms_of_service
Privacy Policy: https://focus-newtab.com/pages/privacy_policy

For more information please visit: https://focus-newtab.com/
Enjoy and please don't forget to  leave us a 5 start review!
